en: I have to do my homework.
example: I have to do my homework after school.

en: She has to clean her room.
example: She has to clean her room before dinner.

en: We have to go to school.
example: We have to go to school on weekdays.

en: He has to wake up early.
example: He has to wake up early for practice.

en: They have to study for the test.
example: They have to study for the test tomorrow.

en: You have to wear a uniform.
example: You have to wear a uniform at school.

en: I have to feed the cat.

example: I have to feed the cat every morning.

en: She has to finish her project.
example: She has to finish her project by Friday.

en: We have to be on time.
example: We have to be on time for the show.

en: He has to take the medicine.
example: He has to take the medicine three times a day.

en: They have to clean up after the party.
example: They have to clean up after the party.

en: You have to finish the test.
example: You have to finish the test in time.

en: I have to call my parents.
example: I have to call my parents tonight.
She has to study hard for the exam.

en: We have to follow the rules.
example: We have to follow the rules at school.
